name: Minute (itch)
description:
A unique dialogue based game where you have to get out of a one minute time loop by finding out  which personnality is appropriate for each person.

When empathising with someone, something magic will happen !

How to play :

W A S D to move
Space to speak to orbs

Credits:

Kappawaii -> Game&Level Design, Programming

The Legend -> 3D Design and Texturing

Cunha -> Textures, Story and Game Design

Tiziano Bellu -> Awesome songs and sound effects

Palsson -> Post-processing

Special thanks to :

MagicALCN for supporting me through this 8 hour livestream
